title: Billionaire Israel Englander 'bilked' ex-wife out of billions
description: Billionaire Israel Englander allegedly “terrorized” his estranged wife and her new gallerist girlfriend to bilk her of billions in their divorce settlement.
content:
Billionaire hedge fund manager Israel Englander allegedly “terrorized” his estranged wife and her new gallerist girlfriend in an effort to bilk her of billions in their divorce settlement, the women claim in new court papers.

title: How to give the Game Boy and GBA games a retro look on Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch’s Game Boy and Game Boy Advance apps allow you to put a "classic feel" filter over the games to make pixel art look a little bit better.
content:
Just a PSA to those who have Nintendo Switch Online and want to dive immediately into the Game Boy and Game Boy Advance games: you can add a “classic feel” filter to replicate the old-school look of playing on one of these handheld devices.
By going ... [1153 chars]
source.name: Polygon

title: 1Password is trying for zero passwords
description: The password manager will soon support the option to create and unlock 1Password accounts using biometric-based passkey technology in its latest step to ditch traditional passwords for good.
content:
1Password is announcing today that, one day soon, it will support the option to create and unlock 1Password accounts using biometric-based passkey technology, ditching the feature that is the name of its entire product.
“For passkeys to be the way fo... [1847 chars]
source.name: The Verge

content:

title: Overwatch 2 players are using the game’s new map to spawn infinite fish
description: Overwatch 2’s Antarctic Peninsula map has a fishing hole that shoots out fish when players fire into it. Fans are using custom content modes to break the game with piles of fish.
content: Overwatch fans are used to finding their own fun in quiet corners of the map or in the lobby. One of the most consistent parts of the first game was everyone in a waiting room rushing up to a toy basketball to try and sink it in a hoop, or going abso... [1505 chars]
source.name: Polygon

title: Explore the zone and bond with your station wagon in Pacific Drive
description: Eurogamer's preview of Pacific Drive, coming to PS5 and PC in 2023.
content:

title: Pizza Tower is paradise for Wario freaks
description: A frantic, fantastic retro platformer on Windows PC that goes above and beyond its inspirations, including Nintendo’s Wario.

title: DJI Updated Its Entry Level Lightweight Drone With 10 km Range
description: The long rumored update to the DJI Mini SE can now also be piloted from up to 10 kilometers away.
